name: Five Night`s an Sharagh
description:
Five Night`s an Sharagh is a fan game that I made in a week in construct 2.

The game is a pure parody of "FNAF". 

The idea of creating it came to my mind at the time of the release of the new part of FNAF "security breach". It seemed to me wrong in terms of atmosphere and gameplay. So I decided to do my 9th part. 

I made the game on construct 2 in just a week. 

The game can be completed in 20 - 30 minutes. The game is free, but if you want to get the materials of the project, then I attached the archive below. Only 1 dollar and it's yours))) Perhaps in the future I will be doing part 2.
